article.title: Swiftships to Provide Boats, Equipment for Iraqi Navy
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Swiftships Shipbuilders LLC is being awarded a $181 million contract for the detail design and construction of nine patrol boats and associated equipment and services for the Iraqi navy. This contract is in support of Foreign Military Sales (FMS) Case IQ -P-SAZ and U.S. Case E4-P-LBT.
